content: Hey @Jack Huey -- I was thinking that these sprint goals would make a very nice "post sprint retro" all by themselves. Do you think you would have time to turn those notes into a blog post? Maybe someone else would like to do it?
I think it'd be cool to post a post and mention that, next week, we'll be doing the "pre-planning" for our next sprint, so stay tuned for an update
Sure, we can do two blog posts: one retrospective, then one for next sprint
(If someone else wants to do it, go for it. But I don't mind)
